short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sanctum enhances your email productivity by archiving non-essential messages, leaving only important emails in your inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Sanctum Chrome Extension works with Sanctum to streamline organizing your Gmail inbox. In the Extension, you can review recent organization jobs, move messages in and out of your inbox, and create new jobs to clean your inbox.
